title: All new Trek Speed Concept gets more aerodynamic, but also much more comfortable
content:
It wouldn’t be a tri bike launch without claims of improved aerodynamics. Don’t worry, Trek assures us that the new Speed Concept certainly qualifies. In fact, they say it’s the fastest bike they’ve ever tested in a wind tunnel. But there are so many other things going on with the new frame that it’s almost

The post All new Trek Speed Concept gets more aerodynamic, but also much more comfortable appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
